mapper.select: SELECT product_category_code, product_category_name, is_group FROM winia_product_mst WHERE main_product = 1;

SELECT wpm.product_category_name, wpm.integrated_flag, wpd.product_code, wpd.product_detail_name FROM winia_product_mst wpm LEFT OUTER JOIN winia_product_dtl wpd ON(wpd.product_category_code = wpm.product_category_code) WHERE wpm.product_category_code = #{product_code};
